page.title: 05THE CHURCHES IN PROBUS 2
page.content: The Churches in Probus contd. Both Anglican & Methodist churches provide various services for the community even if they no longer play an intergral part in village life.The Anglican church has about 20 weddings & 10 funerals a year with increasing numbers of baptisms.It does not lead community activities but encourages people to join village groups eg.Womens Institute.The first Sunday after july 5th is celebrated as St. Probus Feast Day no longer a village holiday,but still with aspecial service & also cocerts,arts & crafts exhibitions or a flower festival are held,although this year there are none.The Methodists have several groups,not only for methodists,meeting in their school room eg. playgroup & aerobics & their church members play an active part on various committees.
